content: Nick Cote will be giving an update on CISL's on-prem cloud pilot project tomorrow (Tuesday, Sept. 12) at 1pm: CISL Cloud Pilot: An Avenue to Accelerate Open Science. The presentation will be one of three talks at the CISL Work in Progress series. The other talks may be of interest to ESDS as well. Nathan Hook will present Campaign Store Files: What are they? Do They Know Things? Let's Find Out!, and Ameya Patil: Interactive Visualization of Data Assimilation Ensemble Forecasts for Hydrology Models. The WIP will hybrid, held in the Mesa Main Seminar Room, or from google meets
